short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows latest price ticker of XRP/USD.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension shows XRP price from cryptocompare (XRP/USD)

Extension Features: 
1. XRP price in USD
2. Display Chart
3. Control refresh time (1 min by default)

--
*There is another exchange shows price in BTC.
